message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so I hope we can discuss the details further.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $850000 for this purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer at this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose to sell the product to you for $900000. This is a fair compromise considering the value and benefits the product offers. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my current budget, I am proposing a counteroffer of $875000 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell it to you for $890000. This offer reflects a reasonable compromise while still allowing us to achieve a satisfactory return on our investment. I hope this proposal aligns with your financial planning.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I am willing to consider it further. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $885000 for the product.

Thank you for your thoughtful counteroffer, Bob. I am pleased to accommodate your budgetary considerations. In light of this, I am willing to sell the product to you for $895000. This offer represents a slight increase from my previous proposal, aiming to ensure a fair transaction for both parties. I hope this meets your expectations.

I appreciate your efforts in trying to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, Alice. Based on my budget and the value I see in the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $890000 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your valuation of our product. In order to move closer to a successful conclusion, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $892500. This figure is a compromise that aims to ensure a profitable transaction for us while providing you with a favorable price. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget and the value of the product, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $890000 for the product.
